name: fullscreen
objective: Activate Full Screen mode in Calc
description: Check if it is possible to activate the full screen mode in the Calc application

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
Click on the top left "View" button
In the drop-down menu, click on "Full screen"
steps.expected: The full screen mode is activated

author: elebideau

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar

name: open-ods
objective: open an ods file with Calc
description: Check if Calc is able to open ods files
pre_condition: Have Calc started and have an ods file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The ods file is correctly opened in Calc

author: elebideau

steps.expected: The xls file is correctly opened in Calc

author: elebideau

name: edit
description: Check if Calc allows to edit documents
pre_condition: Have Calc started in foreground with an existing calc document open

steps.description: Type some letters with the keyboard
steps.expected: The letters are printed on the Calc page

author: elebideau

name: save-ods
objective: save an ods file with Calc
description: Check if Calc allows to save ods documents
pre_condition: Have Calc started in foreground with an unsaved and edited document open

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "ODF Spreadsheet (.ods)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in ods format in the selected directory

author: elebideau

name: save-xls
objective: save a xls file with Calc
description: Check if Calc allows to save xls documents
pre_condition: Have Calc started in foreground with an unsaved and edited document open

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "Microsoft Excel 97/2000/XP/2003 (.xls)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in xls format in the selected directory

author: elebideau

author: elebideau

name: cell-function
description: Check if Calc is able to work properly

steps.description: Click on the top field bar

steps.expected: 5 appears in the first column, first line

steps.description: Click on the top field bar

steps.expected: 37 appears in the first column, second line

steps.description: Click on the top field bar

steps.expected: 21 appears in the first column, third line

author: elebideau

name: ods-xls-conversion
description: Check if Calc is able to convert an ods file into a xls file, and to convert this xls file into an ods file while respecting the format
pre_condition: Have Calc started and have an ods file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The ods file is correctly opened in Calc

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "Microsoft Excel 97/2000/XP/2003 (.xls)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu
In the "Confirm File Format" window, click on "Use Microsoft Excel 97/2000/XP/2003 Format"
steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in xls format in the selected directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select the xls file previously saved

steps.expected: The xls file is correctly opened in Calc

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "ODF Spreadsheet (.ods)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in ods format in the selected directory and it is equal to the original ods file

author: elebideau

name: ods-xlsx-conversion
description: Check if Calc is able to convert an ods file into a xlsx file, and to convert this xlss file into an ods file while respecting the format
pre_condition: Have Calc started and have an ods file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar

steps.expected: The ods file is correctly opened in Calc

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "Microsoft Excel 2007/2010 XML (.xlsx)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu
In the "Confirm File Format" window, click on "Use Microsoft Excel 2007/2010 XML Format"
steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in xlsx format in the selected directory

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select the xlsx file previously saved

steps.expected: The xlsx file is correctly opened in Calc

steps.description: Click on "File" on the top-left bar
Select "ODF Spreadsheet (.ods)" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The document has been correctly saved in ods format in the selected directory and it is equal to the original ods file

author: elebideau

name: export-png
objective: export a single chart in Calc as a png image
description: Check if the new LibreOffice Calc version allows to export a single chart as a png image
pre_condition: Have Calc started and have a chart edited

steps.description: In the drop-down menu, click on "Export as graphic..."
In the file manager window, select a directory
Select "PNG - Portable Network Graphic" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The chart has been properly exported in the selected directory as a png image

author: elebideau

name: export-jpg
objective: export a single chart in Calc as a jpg image
description: Check if the new LibreOffice Calc version allows to export a single chart as a jpg image
pre_condition: Have Calc started and have a chart edited

steps.description: In the drop-down menu, click on "Export as graphic..."
In the file manager window, select a directory
Select "JPEG - Joint Photographic Experts Group" with the "All formats" drop-down menu

steps.expected: The chart has been properly exported in the selected directory as a jpg image

author: elebideau
